alert.note: Alert for Florence; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 7:09PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Florence and northwestern Williamsburg Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 708 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Hebron, or 11 miles west of Kingstree, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Kingstree, Salters, Hebron, Cades, Scranton, Olanta, Lane, Greeleyville, Central Crossroads, Lake City Community Hospital, and Williamsburg Regional Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
